title: Ep 165: State of the Artist with Beth Pickens
itunes:title: Ep 165: State of the Artist with Beth Pickens
itunes:subtitle: Kate stocks her cart for the Sephora sale and Doree takes a chance on a pop-culture rec from her mom. Then, artists' counselor and author Beth Pickens (Make Your Art No Matter What) joins them to talk about being an artist even when you’re not pai...
description:
Kate stocks her cart for the Sephora sale and Doree takes a chance on a pop-culture rec from her mom. Then, artists' counselor and author Beth Pickens (Make Your Art No Matter What) joins them to talk about being an artist even when you’re not paid for your art, how your age shouldn’t restrict you from trying new things, and why she reminds herself that she is going to die several times a day. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show, and sign up for the Forever35 Newsletter at forever35podcast.com/newsletter.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
